title: Tanu Tiwari – Data Scientist & GenAI
text:
Tanu Tiwari


Data Scientist • Generative AI • Research


I work at the intersection of Machine Learning, NLP and real-world systems. My interests include Large Language Models, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), time-series forecasting, and scientific applications of AI.

title: Meet Tanu
text:
Hey, I am a Data Scientist working at Deloitte, combining technical rigor with strong communication to deliver measurable business impact.
I translate complex data into clear actions: I design and deliver ML solutions that solve business problems, deploy reliably, and are trusted by stakeholders.
“I focus on building practical, interpretable models that help teams make better decisions—fast. Collaboration and clear storytelling are how data becomes value.”

title: Meet Tanu
text:
Background

Role: Senior Data Scientist, Deloitte
Experience: 4+ years in analytics and machine learning across consulting and industry teams
Education: Bachelors in ECE, Jabalpur(M.P.)

title: Meet Tanu
text:
Day-to-day

Translate client questions into analytical approaches and testable hypotheses
Build end-to-end ML solutions: data ingestion, feature engineering, model development, validation, and deployment
Produce dashboards and reports that tell a clear story for stakeholders
Mentor junior analysts and collaborate with cross-functional teams (engineering, product, strategy)

title: Meet Tanu
text:
Skills & Tools

Programming: Python (pandas, scikit-learn, PyTorch)
Data platforms: SQL, Spark, BigQuery
MLOps & deployment: Docker, MLflow, cloud services.
Visualization: Tableau, Power BI, Plotly
Methods: supervised/unsupervised learning, causal inference, time-series, A/B testing

title: Meet Tanu
text:
Core Values

Client-first: craft solutions tailored to business outcomes, not just technical novelty
Responsible AI: prioritize fairness, interpretability, and reproducibility
Pragmatism: prefer simple, robust models that are maintainable in production

title: Meet Tanu
text:
Project Interests

Demand forecasting that reduced inventory costs by 12%
Churn-prediction model integrated into client CRM, enabling targeted retention campaigns
Explainable ML pipeline for regulatory reporting and model governance
